#summary This document lists future versions and features.
#labels Featured

Version 1.2 (development tag)
   * Plugin Manager - Port the MindTreeTk PluginManager
   * Drag & Drop - Get it working within a single outline widget
   * Shortcuts - 'Ctrl-Left' and 'Ctrl-Right' working properly.

Version 1.3 (development tag)
   * Import/Export Plugins
   * Spell Checking Plugin (provided pyEnchant for Python 2.6 is ready)
   * Find/Replace Plugin

Version 1.4 (development tag)
   * Subtree Cut & Paste
   * Article Undo/Redo

Version 1.5 (public alpha)
   * RTF - All articles in RTF
   * distutils script - write an initial script for distutils
   * Help File

Version 1.6 (public beta)
   * Text Styling Toolbars - implement toolbars for text styling

Version 1.7 (public beta)
   * Images in articles - support inserting images into articles

Version 1.9 (public release Candidate)
   * py2exe

Version 2.0 (Final Release)
   * All Capabilities of MindTree Tk

Version 3.0 (Final Release)
   * All Capabilities originally targeted for next major release of MindTree Tk
      * Printing
      * Lists
      * Tables
   * Full Undo/Redo (tree editing and across editing of different articles)

Version 3.0 (Final Release)
   * Create an OutlineView widget (separate the article editor from the OutlineEditor widget)
   * Multiple Views
      * Cut & Paste across
      * Drag & Drop across
      * Changes reflected across
   * Customizable HTML exporting
   * Pluggable Content Views/Handlers
